fi.imberg.juhani.ernu.repl

Interface REPLUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwingREPL, TerminalREPL

    public interface REPLUI
    Abstracts the UI portion of the REPL.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void comment(String string)
      Display a comment
      void display(String string)
      Display a normal string
      void error(String string)
      Display an error
      void ok(boolean bool)
      Informs the UI if the last execute was ok or not
      void raw(int b)
      Displays a raw byte.
      String read()
      Returns the next command from the UI
      boolean ready()
      Does the UI have a line to read
